front.title: YANG Model for Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) Configuration

abstract.t: This document specifies a minimal YANG model for TCP on devices that are configured by network management protocols. The YANG model defines a container for all TCP connections and groupings of authentication parameters that can be imported and used in TCP implementations or by other models that need to configure TCP parameters. The model also includes basic TCP statistics. The model is NMDA (RFC 8342) compliant.
